title: Sacred Ramayana Trail
description: A spiritually enriching journey through Sri Lanka's sacred Ramayana trail. Explore mythical sites like Ravana's cave, Ashok Vatika, and the temples of Nuwara Eliya and Trincomalee, weaving a tapestry of culture, legend, and devotion. This itinerary is perfect for travelers seeking a deeper connection with ancient stories and divine landscapes.

activities: Head to Kataragama and check into hotel
Visit Sita Amman Temple and Hakgala Garden
Visit Sri Bhakta Hanuman Temple on Ramboda hills
Visit Temple of the Tooth Relic

title: Elite Island Escape
description: Indulge in the ultimate island escape with curated luxury at every stop. From scenic hot-air balloon rides over Sigiriya to private safaris in Yala and exclusive beach cruises in Weligama, this tour offers sophistication, relaxation, and once-in-a-lifetime experiences across Sri Lanka's most elite destinations.

activities: Visit the Temple of the Tooth Relic for the evening ceremony
Climb the Lion Rock of Sigiriya for Sunset
Evening safari in Yala National Park
Attend a beach party at night

title: Wild Eco Adventure
description: An immersive eco-adventure through Sri Lanka's hidden gems. Trek waterfalls in Riverstone, live alongside indigenous Veddha communities, canoe in scenic lagoons, and explore lush national parks. This experience-rich itinerary is perfect for adventurous souls who thrive in nature and seek authentic cultural encounters.

activities: Waterfall trek, Riverstone hill, and Pitawala Pathana Plains trek (Knuckles Mountains)
Morning safari in Wasgamuwa national park
Dinner and overnight stay at Veddha Village
Trek to scenic waterfall with picnic lunch
Check in to the lakeside camp
Ride a catamaran in the Sora Bora Tank to watch the sunrise and enjoy an outdoor breakfast
Enroute trekking expeditions (tea plantation, pine forest, typical Kandyan village, and rice fields)
Dinner and overnight stay at Knuckles Mountain Camp
Waterfall trek and swim at the base of the waterfall
Stream slides and confidence jumps at Adventure camp
Head from Haputale railway station to Ella
Trek through central highlands (rainforest patch, railroads, tunnels, scenic and remote tea estates)
Dinner and overnight stay at remote home stay
Boat safari at Gal Oya national park
Boat safari in the largest lake of Sri Lanka at dusk
Jeep drive through the jungle to Nilgala river
Relax and leisure walk around the lodge
Afternoon safari at Yala National Park
Morning safari at Yala National Park

title: Hidden Gems Explorer
description: Delve into Sri Lanka's off-the-beaten-path wonders—from rafting in Kitulgala to sunrise climbs at Adam's Peak, tea trails in the highlands, and secluded wilderness at Gal Oya. This itinerary celebrates serene nature, spiritual peaks, and rural charm for those looking beyond the typical tourist trail.

activities: Raft in the white waters of Kitulgala
Have an early dinner and sleep before the midnight hike to Adam's Peak
Watch the sunrise from Adam's Peak
Explore the picturesque surroundings and old churches nearby
Visit a tea estate and pluck your own tea
Board a scenic train from Hatton to Ella
Morning jungle trek with a Veddha
A boat safari in the largest lake of Sri Lanka at dusk
Check out of hotel after breakfast
Visit Dambana the chief Veddha Village and learn about their way of life
Ride a catamaran in the Sora Bora Tank to watch the sunrise and enjoy an outdoor breakfast
Visit Gerandi Ella on the way
Hike to Meemure Village and bathe in a natural pool
Return to hotel and check out
Night walk to see the slender loris
Check out of hotel and head to Kalpitiya
Visit the Ritigala Forest Reserve on the way
Visit the Anavilundawa RAMSAR Wetland Sanctuary
Check out of hotel and leave for departure

title: Romance & Bliss
description: A romantic getaway crafted for unforgettable memories. From couple's spa treatments and private sunrise climbs at Sigiriya to sunset sails and intimate cultural encounters, this itinerary blends romance, relaxation, and adventure across Sri Lanka's most charming destinations.

activities: Private candlelit dinner on Bentota Beach
Couples' Ayurveda massage at Spa Ceylon
Sunset cruise on the Madu River (with champagne)
Handwritten love notes delivered via butler service
Private sunrise Sigiriya climb (avoid crowds, picnic at the top)
Hot-air balloon ride over Dambulla (with champagne toast)
Jungle bubble bath under the stars
Temple of the Tooth at golden hour (private blessing)
Tea-tasting for two at Handunugoda Tea Estate
Personalized horoscope reading by an astrologer
Train ride to Ella (reserved first-class seats, scenic views)
Private hike to Little Adam's Peak (sunrise picnic)
Visit Nine Arches Bridge (exclusive photo session)
Cooking class (learn Sri Lankan love recipes)
Hot tub under the stars with mountain views
Private beach dinner with torches & violin music
Ayurvedic couple's massage by the ocean
Sunset horseback ride on Goyambokka Beach
Check out of hotel and leave for departure

title: Green Heart Expeditions
description: An energizing journey through Sri Lanka's eco-rich heartland. Canoe along tranquil rivers, cycle through rural trails, and scramble through forested paths in Sigiriya. This tour is perfect for eco-conscious travelers and nature lovers seeking an active getaway immersed in community, wildlife, and raw natural beauty.

activities: Dinner and overnight stay at Hotel
Nature trail (Forest walk/ boulder scramble/ caving/ stream hike)
Stream trek and swim in natural pool
Cycle to Sigiriya rock & climb Sigiriya rock fortress
Return to hotel and freshen up

title: Classic Sri Lanka
description: A quintessential exploration of Sri Lanka's cultural and natural highlights. From the ancient cities of Anuradhapura and Sigiriya to the hill country charm of Ella and wildlife in Yala, this itinerary offers a balanced blend of history, heritage, and adventure—ideal for first-time visitors.

activities: Go to Anuradhapura in the morning
Climb the Lion Rock of Sigiriya for the Sunset
Visit the Dambulla Royal Cave temples
Attend the morning ceremony of the Temple of the Tooth Relic
Visit a tea plantation and pluck your own tea
Board the scenic train from Nanu Oya to Ella
Hike the Ella Rock (OPTIONAL; Ziplining in Ella)
Evening safari at the Yala National Park

title: Coastal Dreaming
description: A sun-soaked tropical escape along Sri Lanka's golden coastline. Surf Narigama Beach, snorkel coral reefs, hike to hidden jungle beaches, and whale-watch off the southern shores. This itinerary is a haven for beach lovers, water sports enthusiasts, and anyone seeking seaside serenity with a touch of adventure.

title: Thrill Island Quest
description: An adrenaline-packed journey across Sri Lanka's mountainous and wild terrains. White-water raft and mountain bike in Kitulgala, zipline over Ella, and go on safari in Udawalawe. Designed for thrill-seekers and nature adventurers, this trip delivers high-energy experiences with breathtaking scenery.

activities: River bath at Kitulgala Adventure Camp
Rain forest trail, stream slide, and confidence jumps
Mountain biking trail to the top of a waterfall
Abseiling the waterfall/Mountain biking through a village
Board hill country train to Ella
Adventure activities (Monkey rope, slithering rope, toddy tapper, aerial rope)

title: Grand Island Odyssey
description: The ultimate grand tour of Sri Lanka, covering nearly every corner of the island. From curd-making and canoeing in traditional villages to surfing in Arugam Bay, tea tasting in Ella, and safari in Wilpattu—this itinerary offers a deep, immersive dive into Sri Lanka's diverse cultures, landscapes, and lifestyles.

activities: Relax or guided walk through the farming field
Full day leisure by the beach or self planned activities
Full day leisure by the beach or self planned activities
Full day safari in Kumana National Park
Private BBQ dinner in Panama beach
Full day at leisure or self planned activities
Trek from Kaluphana to Ohiya via Bambarakanda waterfall
Head to Horton Plains National Park
Singing performance by Tamil ethnic staff
12 AM pick up to begin hike to Adam's Peak
Off-road jeep ride to Sigiriya village

title: Feathers & Fangs
description: A paradise for wildlife lovers and birdwatchers. Explore Sinharaja rainforest, Yala's big cats, and the wetlands of Bundala. With full-day safaris and guided trails, this journey is designed for those passionate about biodiversity, conservation, and close encounters with Sri Lanka's wild residents.

activities: Bathe in Kekuna Ella Water Fall
Check out and head to Yala
Evening safari in Bundala National Park
Full day safari in Yala National Park
Full day safari in Yala National Park
Morning bird watching in Tissa lake
Full day bird watching trail in Makandawa rainforest
Check out and Head to Negombo

title: Wildlife Haven Lanka
description: A deep dive into Sri Lanka's rich natural habitats. Witness dolphins in Kalpitiya, elephants in Habarana, and leopards in Wilpattu, all while enjoying immersive safaris and serene jungle retreats. This itinerary caters to eco-travelers and wildlife enthusiasts seeking intimate experiences in nature.

activities: Head to Wilpattu and check in
Full day safari at Wilpattu National Park
Full day safari at Wilpattu National Park
Afternoon boat safari in Gal Oya NP
Morning Jeep safari in Gal Oya NP
Spend the day in Horton Plains National Park
Afternoon Safari in Bundala National Park
Full day safari in Yala National Park
Full day safari in Yala National Park

title: Cultural Odyssey
description: A cultural odyssey through Sri Lanka's ancient cities and northern treasures. Experience Wilpattu's wildlife, Jaffna's Tamil heritage, and the ruins of Anuradhapura. This tour bridges the island's diverse histories and landscapes, offering a profound sense of connection to its past and present.

activities: Morning safari at Wilpattu National Park
Lunch at the local restaurant in Jaffna town
Visit the Dutch fortress of Jaffna
Visit Hanuman temple, Kadurugoda temple,  Keerimalai springs,  Naguleswaren Kovil and Point Pedro
Go to Nallur temple for evening ceremony
Meet host and cook Jaffna crab curry
Visit farmer's family and cook lunch
Visit Temple of the Tooth Relic (evening)
Visit tea plantation and pluck tea
Scenic train from Nanu Oya to Ella
OPTIONAL: whale watching, diving, snorkeling, surfing
Head to Galle and explore Dutch Fort

title: Heritage Heartland Tour
description: Journey through the heart of Sri Lanka's heritage—from Wilpattu's wetlands to Jaffna's vibrant temples and Anuradhapura's sacred ruins. Ideal for culture-curious travelers, this itinerary offers meaningful experiences, local interactions, and a panoramic view of Sri Lanka's soul.

activities: Evening safari at Wilpattu National Park
Visit Hanuman temple, Kadurugoda temple,  Keerimalai springs,  Naguleswaren Kovil and Point Pedro
Go to Nallur temple for evening ceremony
Meet host and cook Jaffna crab curry
Visit farmer's family and cook lunch
Visit Temple of the Tooth Relic (evening)
Scenic train from Nanu Oya to Ella
Evening safari at Udawalawa National Park
Day at leisure - Explore Ahangama & Weligama Stretch
OPTIONAL: whale watching, diving, snorkeling, surfing
Morning at leisure - Explore Ahangama & Weligama
Evening walk in Galle Fort & dinner

title: Luxe Island Odyssey
description: A luxurious exploration of Sri Lanka's historical wonders and natural beauty. From ancient capitals and temple tours to exclusive resorts and gourmet dining, this itinerary seamlessly blends cultural discovery with top-tier comfort—ideal for travelers seeking elegance with enrichment.

activities: Visit Temple of the Tooth Relic (evening)
Visit tea plantation and pluck tea
Evening Safari in Yala National Park
Day at leisure at the resort
Evening walk in the Galle Fort & dinner
